statements: SELECT * FROM MeetingRoles;
SELECT role_id, role_name FROM MeetingRoles WHERE role_id > 5;
SELECT role_name, role_description FROM MeetingRoles WHERE role_id = 3;
SELECT role_id, role_name, role_description FROM MeetingRoles ORDER BY role_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM MeetingRoles WHERE role_name ILIKE 'C%';
SELECT * FROM MeetingRoles WHERE role_id = 1;
SELECT role_id, role_name FROM MeetingRoles ORDER BY role_name DESC;
SELECT role_id, role_name, role_description FROM MeetingRoles WHERE role_id > 2 AND role_name LIKE '%Lead%' ORDER BY role_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM MeetingRoles WHERE role_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT role_id, UPPER(role_name) AS role_name_upper FROM MeetingRoles;
SELECT * FROM participant_roles;
SELECT role_name, role_description FROM participant_roles;
SELECT role_id, role_name FROM participant_roles ORDER BY role_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM meeting_privileges;
SELECT privilege_name, privilege_description FROM meeting_privileges ORDER BY privilege_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM participant_roles WHERE role_id = 1;
SELECT role_name, role_description FROM participant_roles ORDER BY role_name ASC;
SELECT privilege_id, privilege_name FROM meeting_privileges WHERE privilege_id > 5 ORDER BY privilege_id DESC;
SELECT role_name, privilege_name FROM participant_roles, meeting_privileges WHERE participant_roles.role_id = 1 AND meeting_privileges.privilege_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM participant_roles, meeting_privileges WHERE participant_roles.role_id = meeting_privileges.privilege_id;
SELECT * FROM participants;
SELECT participant_id, name, email FROM participants ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, role FROM participants WHERE role = 'Admin';
SELECT participant_id, name, email FROM participants WHERE participant_id < 100;
SELECT * FROM participants WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT * FROM participants WHERE role='Admin';
SELECT name, email FROM participants WHERE participant_id = 123;
SELECT participant_id, name, email, role FROM participants WHERE name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM meeting_roles WHERE role_name='Moderator';
SELECT p.name, r.role_name, rp.privilege_name FROM participants p JOIN meeting_roles r ON p.role = r.role_name JOIN role_privileges rp ON r.role_id = rp.role_id;
SELECT * FROM MeetingModerators;
SELECT moderator_name, moderator_email FROM MeetingModerators ORDER BY moderator_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM MeetingParticipants WHERE participant_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT attendee_name, attendee_email FROM MeetingAttendees WHERE attended_meeting_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM ParticipantRoles LIMIT 3;
SELECT role_name, privileges FROM ParticipantRoles WHERE participant_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM MeetingModerators WHERE moderator_role = 'Admin' ORDER BY moderator_name DESC;
SELECT participant_name, participant_email FROM MeetingParticipants WHERE participant_roles @> '{"role":"admin"}';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MeetingAttendees WHERE attended_meeting_id = 'a123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT attendee_name, attendee_email FROM MeetingAttendees WHERE attendee_email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM Participants;
SELECT participant_name, role FROM Participants WHERE role='Admin';
SELECT meeting_topic, meeting_date FROM Meetings ORDER BY meeting_date DESC;
SELECT role_name, role_description FROM Roles WHERE role_id=1;
SELECT participants.participant_name, meetings.meeting_topic FROM Participants JOIN Meetings ON Participants.participant_id = Meetings.moderator_id;
SELECT * FROM Participants ORDER BY participant_name DESC, participant_id ASC;
SELECT participant_name, role FROM Participants WHERE role='Admin' AND privilege='Full Access';
SELECT * FROM Meetings WHERE meeting_date >= '2022-01-01' AND meeting_date <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY meeting_date ASC;
SELECT meeting_topic, participant_name FROM Meetings INNER JOIN Participants ON Meetings.moderator_id = Participants.participant_id;
SELECT role_name, COUNT(*) as Count FROM Roles LEFT JOIN RolePrivileges ON Roles.role_id = RolePrivileges.role_id GROUP BY Roles.role_id ORDER BY Count DESC;
